gen_llosa

gen_llosa.Rd

plot the Llosa matrix

gen_llosa(
  dataset,
  borne = FALSE,
  annotate = TRUE,
  annotatetext = c("Secondaire", " Plus", "Basique", "Clef")
)

Arguments

dataset

the dataset to use
borne

booleen do you want xlim and ylim
annotate

booleen do you want annotation
annotatetext

annotation text

Examples



library(tetraclasse)
gen_avis(100) %>%
  prepare_base() %>%
  gen_llosa()
